abilities.description: (PASSIVE)FURY OF THE NORTHAfter being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.
abilities.name: FURY OF THE NORTHA

abilities.description: (Q)ARCTIC ASSAULTSejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
abilities.name: ARCTIC ASSAULTS

abilities.description: (W)WINTER'S WRATHSejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage, slowing enemies and applying Frost stacks.
abilities.name: WINTER

abilities.description: (E)PERMAFROSTSejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
abilities.name: PERMAFROSTS

abilities.description: (R)GLACIAL PRISONSejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
abilities.name: GLACIAL PRISONS
